H0.text: authorities involved in formulating accounting standard in india. ICAI

H1.text: authorities involved in formulating accounting standard in india. SEBI

H2.text: authorities involved in formulating accounting standard in india. MCA

H3.text: authorities involved in formulating accounting standard in india. CII

A4.text: Compliance with accounting standards issued by ICAI has become a statutory requirement with the notification of Companies (Accounting Standards) Rules, 2006 by the Government of India.

A5.text: The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India, abbreviated as ICAI, is India's largest professional accounting body under the administrative control of Ministry of Corporate Affairs, Government of India.

A6.text: SEBI is the regulatory body for securities and commodity market in India under the administrative domain of Ministry of Finance within the Government of India.
